description: This table contains error information returned by an external system for hospital coding workflows.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EXT_ERROR_CODE
columns.description: The error code returned by an external system.

columns.name: EXT_ERROR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of error returned by an external system.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Error


Warning

columns.name: EXT_ERR_WORKFLOW_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hospital coding workflow associated with the external error code.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coding


Alternate Coding


Clinical Documentation Improvement


Abstracting


Specialty Association

columns.name: EXT_ERROR_TEXT
columns.description: The user-facing message supplied with the external error code.
